Setting the Bar with a Rum Runner Vacation in Key West at The Marker Resort!

Introducing the Key West Pilar Rum Package

Are you in search of a unique Key West travel experience that includes cocktails and tastings mixed with a little bit of Hemingway history in historic old town by the seaport? If the answer is yes then take a look at our Key West Pilar Rum Package: includes a tour of the Hemingway Rum Co - Papa’s Pilar Distillery, a commemorative flask, certificate of graduation as a Marker Rum Runner, and two drink tickets for Papa’s Pilar Rum Cocktails! Book The Marker Certified Rum Runner Package. This special Key West vacation package is available all year long!

About Papas Pilar, Hemingway Rum Company

Papa's Pilar® Rum – in both Dark and Blonde expression, is an ultra-premium, artisan-crafted rum inspired by Ernest ‘Papa’ Hemingway and celebrates his literary legacy and adventurous spirit.

Photo Credit: Papa’s Pilar

Where is the Hemingway Rum Company, Papa’s Pilar Distillery located?

Papa's Pilar, Hemingway Rum Company, is located close to our resort at the corner of Greene and Simonton Streets just yards from where Hemingway used to dock his boat, the Pilar. In addition to the working distillery, the historic building also includes an experience center, innovation lab, trading post, and tasting room.

Photo credit: Papa’s Pilar Website

What people are saying…

Knowledgeable people making a superior spirit

Chanced upon this joint so stopped in. I'm not a big fan of rum, but I'm also not one to say no to free samples. Tried both white and dark rums, both very good. The barender knew alot about making spirits and provided me much information. When he blended the two rums, well that there was the cats pajamas. Excellent taste. ~ markesolomon via TripAdvisor

So whether you're a rum enthusiast or not, give Pilar Rum a try and always remember what words of wisdom from the man who inspired us:

“Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.” ~ Ernest Hemingway

Papa’s Pilar is an ultra-premium rum inspired by one of the greatest adventurers! Become a certified rum runner and book your Key West Getaway today! #lovethemarker
